Team Combos: does it matter if the other monster is dead?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : Team Combos: does it matter if the other monster is dead?
By Apocalypse on Sunday, October 16, 2005 - 05:02 pm:

My monsters seem to have 2 different counter attacks. My Naga for example only uses the one where it rolls over the opposing monster only if it is dead. Has anyone noticed this before? Are there other species that this applies for? Is there a difference in power depending on which counter attack is used?

By Apocalypse on Monday, October 17, 2005 - 12:34 pm:

Sorry, I meant to say team combo where I said counter attacks. (this is what happens when you play Mr4 and type all at once)
